page.title: 05SEASCALE SCHOOL. M.HUDDART.
page.content: We stood on the school steps. The grass nearby had a muddy appearance because of children running over it when the grass was wet.Some men were in the boiler room with their radio on full blast.A bit of the paintwork had fallen off the wall of the school.You could see Windscale Atomic works. The steam was tumbling out of the chimneys.It was very quiet.The pond was colourful with flowers.Odd sea gulls flew over.In the distance there were lambs and sheep.From this distance they looked like bits of white material.
